Open the centrifuge.

After the centrifugation, the tube is removed from the centrifuge.

Take a micropipette.
Insert a fresh tip to the micropipette.
Using the pipette, pipette out the supernatant.
Take a new tube.
Transfer the supernatant into the tube.

Discard the tip of the micropipette.
